Text: Thanks for this. Requesting Friends Entire 10 seasons in BluRay UNCUT please with Extras......Will seed forever :)
Many, many thanks, DownTYU. Excellent upload. Other seasons also coming soon?
Yep! thanks So much. Been waiting for this in  good quality for about 15 years! Please post extras and commentary, please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Seems that the Blue Ray release isn't the UNCUT version. Disappointing.
Finally Friends HD. Seinfeld was out for years. Now for the other few good sitcoms in HD :)

lol, why are some people talking about the UNCUT version?? Rachel's nipples are censored here? That would be a real shame, her hard and pointy nipples were the best thing in Friends :D Kidding, I love this show, but her nipples were really distracting :D
